intellipulse.title: Intellipulse
intellipulse.subtitle: The new generation of vibe coding
intellipulse.description: Experience the future of coding with AI-powered assistance that understands your flow and enhances your productivity

webBased.title: Web-Based
webBased.description: Code anywhere with our powerful web interface
webBased.content: No installation required. Start coding instantly in your browser with full AI assistance.

vsCodeExtension.title: VS Code Extension
vsCodeExtension.description: Bring Intellipulse directly to your favorite editor
vsCodeExtension.content: Seamless integration with VS Code for developers who prefer their familiar environment.

freeUnlimited.title: Free & Unlimited
freeUnlimited.description: No limits, no subscriptions, just pure coding joy
freeUnlimited.content: Enjoy unlimited AI-powered coding assistance without any restrictions or paywalls.

vibeBasedCoding.title: Vibe-Based Coding
vibeBasedCoding.description: AI that understands your coding style and adapts to your workflow

intelligentSuggestions.title: Intelligent Suggestions
intelligentSuggestions.description: Context-aware code completions and refactoring suggestions

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Works with all popular programming languages and frameworks

realTimeCollaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
realTimeCollaboration.description: Share your coding sessions and get help from the community

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your code is in local, we never store or share your data.

zeroSetup.title: Zero Setup
zeroSetup.description: Start coding immediately without any configuration

cta.title: Ready to experience the future of coding?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who are already coding with Intellipulse

metadata.title: Search Features - {brandName}
metadata.description: Discover powerful search capabilities in {brandName} including research mode, canvas documents, and lightning-fast results.

search.title: {brandName} Search
search.subtitle: Search features that empower you to find information quickly and efficiently.

search.title: Search
search.subtitle: Find information faster with detailed content.

searchQuickly.title: Search Quickly
searchQuickly.description: No setup is required. Simply tell the AI to search, and it will perform the search.

ultraFaster.title: Ultra Faster
ultraFaster.description: Our optimized search logic performs web searches in an instant and passes the content on to AI.

canvasDocuments.title: Canvas Documents
canvasDocuments.description: By summarizing the results of AI searches on Canvas, you can easily read them.

research.title: Research
research.subtitle: Autonomously research the web and summarize information on Canvas.

intelligentResearch.title: Intelligent Research
intelligentResearch.description: Advanced AI-powered research that understands context and intent for more accurate results.

autonomousSearch.title: Autonomous Search
autonomousSearch.description: Our research mode allows you to search the web autonomously, summarizing information quickly.

researchModes.title: Research Modes
researchModes.description: You can choose the depth of your research. Would you like more details? No problem.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Advanced Search?
cta.subtitle: Try {brandName}'s powerful search features and transform how you discover and research information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

email.title: Email Us
email.description: Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

x.title: Contact with X
x.description: Send us a direct message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.responseTime: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours.

partnership.title: Do you want to partner with us?
partnership.description: If you are interested in partnering with us, please reach out via email or X. We are always open to collaboration and new opportunities.

metadata.title: Partners | {brandName}
metadata.description: Our trusted partners and collaborators who help make {brandName} possible.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with industry-leading organizations to deliver cutting-edge AI solutions and ensure the highest standards of innovation, security, and reliability.

noPartners.name: No Partners
noPartners.description: Still looking for partners to help us build the future of AI.

privateCloud.title: Private Compute Cloud
privateCloud.description: Dedicated private cloud infrastructure for secure and efficient AI workloads.

freeUnlimited.title: Free and Unlimited Uses
freeUnlimited.description: Enjoy free and unlimited usage of our AI services with no hidden costs.

customApi.title: Custom API
customApi.description: Access to a custom API tailored to your specific needs and integration requirements.

cta.title: Interested in Partnership?
cta.description: We're always looking for innovative partners to collaborate with. If you're interested in exploring partnership opportunities, we'd love to hear from you.

student.title: Pro Plan for Students
student.subtitle: Unlock your academic potential with unlimited access to premium AI models and exclusive student benefits.

unlimitedPremium.title: Unlimited Premium Model Uses
unlimitedPremium.description: Access to all premium AI models without usage limits. Perfect for intensive study sessions and research projects.

discordRoles.title: Discord Exclusive Roles
discordRoles.description: Join our discord community with special Discord roles and access to student-only channels.

prioritySupport.title: Priority Support
prioritySupport.description: Get faster response times and dedicated support to help you succeed in your academic journey.

included.title: What's Included
included.description: Everything you need to excel in your studies with AI assistance.
features: Unlimited access to o3-pro, Claude Opus 4 and other premium models
